name: Renaissance Chicago Hotel

reviews.text: I was very pleased with this hotel... it's around 4 blocks from the train that goes to the airport, and right on the loop subway. Hotels in Chicago seem to be a higher standard than many cities. Ask to see if you can get a view of the river, it's beautiful.
reviews.title: Big rooms, near trains, ask for a view of the river

reviews.text: I'm platinum with Marriott (75 nights or more per year) and the front desk upgraded me to top floor suite. Everything was perfect. Gigantic marble bathroom- separate tub and shower. Very classy, no complaints.
reviews.title: Upgraded to top floor suite- quite happy

description: Encounter the sophisticated ambiance of a premier Chicago hotel near the theatre districts and famed museums at the Renaissance Chicago Downtown Hotel, an intriguing urban sanctuary in the heart of downtown. Situated on the north edge of the Loop, this luxury hotel is steps away from upscale shopping, fine dining and famed Millennium Park. Revitalize body and mind in luxury hotel rooms boasting unique amenities with marble accents and stunning skyline views of the city's architecture. Unwind in style at the Rejuvenation Center, a refreshing indoor pool and indulgent spa treatments. Experience Bar Novo, a downtown setting unlike any other providing a trendy and distinguished night-life scene serving delectable dishes and creative cocktails. Discover something wonderfully new hotel providing guests a refined atmosphere and sense of style at the Renaissance Chicago Downtown Hotel.
